name: Off the Clock
description: Everyone needs a break now and then. But when Starfleet crew members fail to return from leisure time activities or shore leave, time off threatens to become more permanent than anyone bargained for.
rules:
-- Unique Augments, Federation, and Ferengi Traditionalists Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using Projector Spock, Ephraim and Dot, any version of Boimler, Billups, Sh'reyan, Pike, Uhura, Ortegas, crew from The Animated Series, Lower Decks, or Very Short Treks will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Projector Spock, Ephraim and Dot, Boimler, Billups, Sh'reyan, Pike, Uhura, Ortegas, or animated crew
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Shaw
featured_crew.flavor: Once again faced with a Borg threat, Shaw sacrifices his life for his crew - even those he was most critical of.

action.name: Go, Go! We'll Cover You!

featured_crew.name: Billups
featured_crew.flavor: Despite all his mother’s tricks and deceptions, Billups never became king and remained in Starfleet.

action.name: This Is A New Low, Mother

featured_crew.name: Jen
featured_crew.flavor: A former member of The Red Shirts Jen aspires to become a captain one day. In the meantime she ignores Mariner and focuses on pottery and yoga.

action.name: Pff...I Don't Think About You At All

rewards.name: Augment Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Augments faction missions.

rewards.name: Federation Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Federation faction missions.

rewards.name: Ferengi Traditionalists Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Ferengi Traditionalists faction missions.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: 10x S. Shuttle
rewards.flavor: 10 Standard Boosts. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Rutherford
rewards.flavor: Rutherford loves being an engineer, and spends his free time talking about how great the Cerritos is with Tendi.

action.name: Okeydokey!

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Tokens
rewards.flavor: Requisition Shuttle Tokens grant access to an additional Shuttle to use for a single Faction Mission.

rewards.name: Reward Multiplier
rewards.flavor: (Shuttle Missions Only) 2x rewards.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.flavor: A former member of The Red Shirts Jen aspires to become a captain one day. In the meantime she ignores Mariner and focuses on pottery and yoga.

action.name: Pff...I Don't Think About You At All

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Shaw
rewards.flavor: Once again faced with a Borg threat, Shaw sacrifices his life for his crew - even those he was most critical of.

action.name: Go, Go! We'll Cover You!

rewards.name: Jen
rewards.flavor: A former member of The Red Shirts Jen aspires to become a captain one day. In the meantime she ignores Mariner and focuses on pottery and yoga.

action.name: Pff...I Don't Think About You At All

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill

screens.text: "Please, Captain, I'm begging you. Don't make me take shore leave! I don't want it, I don't need it. Look, I'll donate it. Commander Sisko would probably love to take a vacation with his son, right? He can have my time. Please, whatever you do, don't make me take time off!"

"That would be inadvisable, Lieutenant Commander. According to Starfleet records, you are among the officers who have gone the longest  without using any leave. The health benefits of leave are well-documented. Also, your mother has repeatedly expressed her concern."

"His mother is a big part of the reason he doesn't want to go on leave. But I get it. I haven't got any plans and I'm in no hurry to run back to the family raisin vineyards to be put to work. I can't think of a less fun way to spend my leave."

"Unfortunately for you, fun is the least of your worries. Starfleet's been more lenient with leave due to the stress of the anomaly crisis, but far too many enlisted personnel have gone missing during their leave. Think you can look into it for us, Captain?"
